title: OCE Servers Crashed?
body:
Hello,

I was playing a game in the OCE server at 2:25pm Queensland Time. I was playing Talon, got baron buff and was about to end the game. However, the game started saying Attempting to reconnect. I ALT+Tab and the client was not saying game in progress, or reconnect. The game was like it never existed... I received no LP nor did the Ezreal I was duoing with. The game was supposed to be on top of the Taric 2/5/15 one.

(http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=EzSmurf)

Please fix the Riot, I want my LP :(. I can confirm that that game was a sure win as there were 3 left on the enemy team against all us 5 with baron buff and two inhibitors were taken...

Sincerely,
Ezsmurf

replies.body:
i just experienced it in 3 games in a row, one game didnt exist when we were losing, the other happened in game and i kept dcing with 21 ping and the third i dced in champ select and could ban because i couldnt reconnect even though im not lagging as im the only one in my household using my internet
Something is up with the serveres. jesus christ riot
